description.zh: 将 UV 坐标直接转为颜色值，便于理解 vUv 的颜色映射。
description.en: Directly convert UV coordinates to color values to facilitate understanding of vUv color mapping.

zh: 学习如何将UV坐标的x和y分量分别映射到颜色的R和G通道。
理解这种可视化方法如何帮助调试和理解UV坐标的分布。
能够创建一个简单的UV可视化着色器。
认识到UV坐标在纹理采样和程序化图案生成中的重要性。
en: Learn how to map the x and y components of UV coordinates to the R and G channels of color, respectively.
Understand how this visualization method can help debug and understand the distribution of UV coordinates.
Be able to create a simple UV visualizer shader.
Recognize the importance of UV coordinates in texture sampling and procedural pattern generation.
